results.title: Role of beta 1-adrenoceptors in hypertensive cardiac hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: Hence, we investigated the role of cardiac beta-receptors by testing the effects of the cardioselective beta-receptor blocker, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, on regression and prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic_Familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024741 @@@ventricular hypertrophy@@@ in this model.

citations.NLM: Lindpaintner K, Sen S. Role of beta 1-adrenoceptors in hypertensive cardiac hypertrophy. J Hypertens. 1987 Dec;5(6):663-9. PMID: 2828468
citations.BibTeX: @article{2828468, title={Role of beta 1-adrenoceptors in hypertensive cardiac hypertrophy.}, author={Lindpaintner K and Sen S}, journal={J Hypertens}, volume={5}, number={6}, pages={663-9}}

results.title: Long-term effect of antihypertensive therapy on left ventricular hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: During the follow-up there was a further significant reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic_Familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024741 @@@ventricular hypertrophy@@@ under all three treatments, but no significant changes in ventricular end-diastolic and end-systolic dimensions or in fractional shortening.

citations.NLM: Franz IW, Tönnesmann U, Behr U, Ketelhut R. Long-term effect of antihypertensive therapy on left ventricular hypertrophy. J Hypertens Suppl. 1987 Dec;5(5):S415-8. PMID: 2965229
citations.BibTeX: @article{2965229, title={Long-term effect of antihypertensive therapy on left ventricular hypertrophy.}, author={Franz IW and Tönnesmann U and Behr U and Ketelhut R}, journal={J Hypertens Suppl}, volume={5}, number={5}, pages={S415-8}}
